## Biography
Dr.Yakasai is an experienced researcher and data science professional with over 7 years of combined experience in data science, statistics, mathematics, and research in academia and corporate America. Expert in applied mathematics, statistics, business analytics, and data science with a rich blend of teaching and quantitative research experience.

Hardworking mathematicians, statisticians, and business/data analysts with expertise in statistical and data modeling, probability, and numerical integration. Proficient in data mining techniques, including data entry, compilation, sampling, cleaning, transformation, QA/QC, data visualization, etc. Strong passion and commitment in artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), and deep learning (DL)

Fauziya holds a Bachelor of Science (BS) in Mathematics from Bayero University, Kano, Nigeria; a Master of Science (MS) in Pure and Applied Mathematics from the African University of Science and Technology, Abuja, Nigeria; a Master of Science (MS) in Probability and Statistics from Auburn University, Auburn, Alabama; and a PhD in Mathematics from Auburn University, Auburn, Alabama. She has a Graduate Certification in Business Analytics from Auburn University in Auburn, Alabama. She is currently a postdoctoral fellow in Data Analysis of R&D partnerships at York University, Canada, and a Data Science consultant at LOCOMeX inc USA.
:::
